effect.sword_shield: User waits for two turns. On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it. Damage inflicted is typeless. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: User waits for two turns. On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it. Damage inflicted is typeless. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.the_crown_tundra: User waits for two turns. On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it. Damage inflicted is typeless. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: User waits for two turns. On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it. Damage inflicted is typeless. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.legends_arceus: User waits for two turns. On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it. Damage inflicted is typeless. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.sword_shield: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.
short_effect.legends_arceus: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
